channel.title: AI Engineering on Sakthi Priyan H
channel.description: Recent content in AI Engineering on Sakthi Priyan H

item.title: Building SQL Translator using AI Coding Agents
item.description: A walkthrough of building a SQL translator using agentic AI, deterministic ANTLR grammars, unified IR, and YAML-driven testing.

item.title: Natural Language Data Processing
item.description: Prototype system that converts natural language into SQL and IR to drive dynamic DAG execution for Hetero Collate workloads.
